New Zealand expects defence capability report in JuneNew Zealand defence minister Judith Collins said on Monday she expects to receive a review into the country's defence capabilities in June, the latest step in the modernisation of the country's military. Australian war hero appeals defamation ruling on reports he was complicit in Afghan unlawful killingsAn Australian court on Monday began hearing the appeal of a decorated war hero, who is fighting a court defamation ruling that found media groups had proven their reports he played a part in the unlawful killings of four Afghans in Afghanistan.
